svg.text:
title: "Week in Ethereum News
August 23, 2020" date: "2020-08-23"
Eth News and Links
Eth1
* Latest Turbogeth alpha release
* Notes from latest Stateless Ethereum call
* Latest core dev call . Beiko’s notes .
* Increase gas price for SLOAD to 2300; CALL family, EXT* family and BALANCE to 2500
* EVM384 : can we do fast crypto in the EVM?
* eip2666 benchmarking
* EIP1559 decreases the risk of 51% attacks
* Tim Roughgarden contracted to simulate eip1559 and escalator algo
Eth2
* This week, the Medalla testnet recovered from a catastrophic event and is finalizing
again. Prysmatic’s catalog of events and Ben Edgington’s shorter writeup
* Shout it from the rooftops : client diversity matters . If you prefer to hear that
in video form, I made a short video on why the incident shows we need client diversity
(and why the incident is great for eth2!)
* Latest what’s new in eth2
* SigmaPrime’s BeaconFuzz update on bug finding - you can help fuzz eth2 clients using
the dockerized fuzzer
* Lighthouse client update, nailing attestation inclusion
* Lodestar client update, lessons learned from Medalla and browser ready light client
* Nimbus client update, performance and stability fixes
* Tutorial to using rumor for client debugging
* an eth2 clock
* A list of eth2 tooling
* Latest eth2 call . Notes from Ben and Mamy
* ZenGo initial results on VDF design cryptanalysis
Layer2
* USDT live on OMG
* Golem picks zk sync
* dYdX announces they’re planning a q4 StarkWare rollup
This newsletter is made possible thanks to Chainlink !
Come learn about the leading ideas in DeFi from top teams building the next wave of
smart contracts at the Smart Contract Summit (Aug 28 - 29th). Synthetix, Aave,
SetProtocol, Nexus Mutual, Kyber and 70+ other DeFi project speakers are sharing what
they’re building next at SmartCon.
Stuff for developers
* Test your Solidity code with the Echida fuzzer
* Sam Sun finds a xSNXa bug
* OpenZeppelin upgrades for Buidler and Truffle
* Golem wasm and VM payloads alpha release for devs
* Dynamic value arrays in Solidity
* For new web3 devs, remember: Ethereum code is not a database
* Debug and profile together with Tenderly Organizations
Ecosystem
* MetaMask restricts commercial use forks with more than 10k users
* How to get your old ENS deposit back and we’re now halfway through the decaying
price premium for expired ENS domains
* Ethereum Foundation: beyond just ecosystem grants
Enterprise
* SAP.com: SAP integration with Ethereum mainnet
* AWS: mint tokens with BurnerFactory and monitor them with BlockScout
* TheBlock research report on CBDCs (central bank digital currencies)
Application layer
* More than 10b USD on ethereum (now 11.3b) after 1b migrated from Tron to ETH
* A primer on Synthetix futures
* YieldSpace , an automated liquidity provider using time to maturity as an input
* Opium’s credit default swaps using Aave credit delegation
* Andre Cronje is now going to do yinsure
* Arbol goes live with parametric rainfall insurance
* DeFi Safety : a score based on “process quality”
* POAP doing Merkle AirDrops and tool to create raffles
* Multis using Unlock for monthly automatic subscription fees
* Yield farming with Set
Tokens/Business/Regulation
* A framework for token value flows
* Haseeb Qureshi: Unbundling Uniswap
* Preparing your ERC20 token to list on Coinbase
* Proof of personhood paper, a review of sybil-resistance
* Hasu: YAM is a Nakamoto scheme
General
* MyCrypto: 10 steps to avoid getting hacked in crypto
* Binance on collaborating with governments to thwart ransomware ring
* Elaine Shi’s Foundations of Distributed Consensus & Blockchains textbook is
available for free
* Brave research on using AZTEC confidential payments on a Quorum POA sidechain
* Sergio Demian Lerner: Satoshi had an optimized miner he didn’t release publicly
* Vitalik on philosophy of blockchain coordination and the accompanying X of n trust
models in blockchains
Job Listings
* MyCrypto's hiring frontend wizards . Remote. ~UTC-7. Go all in this bull run.
* Celer Network: Android developer
* Trail of Bits: blockchain security engineers & senior software engineers
* Drive global Chainlink adoption as an Ecosystem Marketer & Head of Growth
* If you’re a dev, 0x is hiring full-stack, back-end, front-end or Solidity devs
Want your job listing here ? $250 per line (~75 character limit including spaces),
payable in ETH/DAI/USDC to evan.ethereum.eth. Questions? thecryptonewspodcast at-gmail
I’m making daily crypto videos
Every day, I’m making 5 minute videos on YouTube .
The available sponsorship slots were tokenized ($EVAN) for this newsletter . You can
now buy enough for a newsletter OTC from me at the spot price, or directly on Balancer
Follow me on twitter: @evan_van_ness
Permalink for this week’s issue:
https://weekinethereumnews.com/week-in-ethereum-news-august-23-2020/
Did you get forwarded this newsletter? Sign up to receive it weekly
Dates of Note
Upcoming dates of note ( new/changes in bold ) :
* Aug 28-29 - Chainlink’s Smart Contract Virtual Summit
* Oct 2-30 - EthOnline hackathon
* Nov 6-7 - virtual Trufflecon
* Nov 16 - MetaMask Provider breaking changes
Week in Ethereum News
